typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	YearQuarter as string
}
source(output(
		userId as string,
		age as string,
		birthYear as string,
		generation as string,
		age_category as string,
		social_state as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 10000,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CuratedCustomerData
source(output(
		userId as string,
		facebook as string,
		twitter as string,
		instagram as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SocialMediaData
CuratedCustomerData filter(!isNull(userId)) ~> FilterNulls
SelectRequiredRows derive(IsAdult = case(toInteger(Age) > 18, "Yes", "No")) ~> AddingIsAdultColumn
FilterNulls select(mapColumn(
		User = userId,
		Age = age,
		Generation = generation,
		BirthYear = birthYear
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRequiredRows
AddingIsAdultColumn, SocialMediaData join(User == userId,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSocialMediaData
AgeToInteger sort(asc(Age, false)) ~> SortByAge
JoinSocialMediaData derive(Age = toInteger(Age)) ~> AgeToInteger
SortByAge sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	mapColumn(
		User,
		Age,
		Generation,
		BirthYear,
		IsAdult,
		FacebookUsage = facebook,
		TwitterUsage = twitter,
		InstagramUsage = instagram
	),
	format: 'table') ~> SinktoProcessed
